453060.name: VRC PRO Deluxe Off-road tracks 3
453060.description:
This VRC PRO Deluxe off-road tracks pack III gives you 5 additional, real existing off-road RC tracks from all around the world.

✓ Expand your off-road tracks
✓ Experience real existing world class tracks
✓ Join more events & more multiplayer sessions

Having new off-road tracks is great fun and excellent for developing your RC racing skills. But even more so, it is a unique opportunity to experience these world-renowned RC racing tracks which most people only get to read about in magazines and on the Internet. Each of the tracks has hosted big, real life Worlds or European championships and huge Nationals.

Access to these tracks will also increase your ability to race others in multiplayer and online events.

DELUXE OFF-ROAD TRACKS 3 PACK:

  • RC Excitement 2
  • C-netic
  • Amain outback
  • Silver dollar 1
  • NEOx 2015

Your new tracks are automatically downloaded by the game, directly after your purchase.

Have fun!
453060.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
